Text: Thanks for making this available. I hear the CD has all sorts of digital clipping and unintentional distortion.

herbman75 you are correct.

I'm actually sorry I shelled out for the CD version. It is sooo badly produced my ears hurt.

kool! i almost... ahh :) kool! vinyl rocks!!!!

Thankyou for this - no wonder I didn't wear the cd out like i did with "get behind"
Thanks for the seeds guys.  I have a question-is there any good way to compress from FLAC to MP3?  I am comfortable using EAC, will it work?  Or do I have to go to LAME directly?

yodayodayodayoda:

EAC is used to rip/extract the music off of a CD. You need a program like the excellent foobar2000 (http://www.foobar2000.org/download.html) and it is free.

Both "Icky Thump" and "Rag and Bone" are different mixes to the incredibly screwed up CD version (and we only have Vlado Meller to blame for that). I have nothing but respect for Steve Hoffman, I only wish he had mastered the cd version of the album too!
if you seed ill send your pornographic images
if it's so much better quality, then keep the torrent alive :(
